description:
Natsumi just wants to give Valentine`s chocolate to her crush, Saburo, but when 556 mistakenly intercepts it and swears to protect it for the whole day, the only way Natsumi can get it back is with a team effort by Phantom Thieves More Peach Summer Snow! Then, Keroro comes in possession of a stone that acts as a magnet for rotten luck, but he holds on to it for the promised reward when its true owner comes to pick it up the following day... if Keroro can survive that long!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La bataille de la saint Valentin / La pierre de la malchance
More Peach Summer Snow - The Decisive Valentine Struggle / Keroro - An Extremely Sorrowful Tale
モアピーチサマースノー 決戦バレンタイン であります / ケロロ 世にも不幸な物語 であります
